title: Digital Wellbeing Market Survey
description:
Do you work in digital wellbeing and want to know, where market opportunities are and how much money you could be making?
We are running a study on the digital wellbeing market - and you get a copy of it for free, as long as you take part in the survey.
It’s completely anonymous and we can’t match your email with answers, so you can be as honest as you wish. The sooner we can get to at least 200 responses, the sooner we’ll be able to publish the outcomes.
Let’s make a difference together! Survey here: https://consciously-digital.typeform.com/dwmarket-fall24
            1 post - 1 participant
            Read full topic
